text: Ara yara allah‌ra santusti labhera jan'ya o nijedera atma balistha karara jan'ya dhana-sampada byaya kare tadera upama kono ucca bhumite abasthita ekati udyana, yekhane musaladhare brsti haya, phale sethaya phalamula janme dbiguna. Ara yadi musaladhare brsti na'o haya tabe laghu brsti'i yathesta. Ara tomara ya karo allah‌ ta yathartha pratyaksakari
